Room.Name: Blue Wagon
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the living quarters of the king of the gypsys.
Room.LongDescription: A multi-colored cloth hangs over a doorway separating this room from the bedroom. A trestle table stands in the middle of the room, loaded with food and bottles of wine. The king of the gypsys talks to his chiefs in this room, planning their activities which will part a few gold pieces from the citizens of Oceancrest. there is a rumor that a lot of gold is stored in this wagon.
